topics.description: The most fundamental verbs every learner needs: būti (to be), turėti (to have), daryti (to do/make)
Common physical and everyday action verbs: eiti (to go), valgyti (to eat), skaityti (to read), keliauti (to travel)
Verbs for speaking, learning, and social interaction: kalbėti (to speak), mokytis (to learn), atsiprašyti (to apologize)
